sentences.en: For ten years she dwelled among the nomads of North America.
sentences.cn: 她在北美游牧民中生活了十年。

sentences.en: He was discovered living under an assumed identity in South America.
sentences.cn: 他被发现以伪造的身分居住在南美洲.

sentences.en: He's touring South America at this moment in time.
sentences.cn: 他此刻正在南美旅游观光。

sentences.en: How do you like America?
sentences.cn: 你觉得美国怎么样？

sentences.en: I may go to America or I may not,it all depends.
sentences.cn: 我也许去美国，也许不去，要视情况而定。

sentences.en: I scrolled down to find "United States of America".
sentences.cn: 我向下滚动文档搜索“美利坚合众国”。

sentences.en: In America, they go out with their friends.
sentences.cn: 在美国，他们与他们的朋友出去。

sentences.en: Latin America lacked skilled labour.
sentences.cn: 拉丁美洲缺乏熟练工人。

sentences.en: North America is connected with South America by the Isthmus of Panama.
sentences.cn: 巴拿马海峡把北美同南美连接起来.

sentences.en: Over drinks , he speaks longingly of his trip to Latin America.
sentences.cn: 他带着留恋的心情, 一边喝酒一边叙述他的拉丁美洲之行.

sentences.en: She scampered in London then went back to America.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦匆忙地游览了一番，然后回到了美国。

sentences.en: So, what of the future of obesity in America ?
sentences.cn: 那么，未来美国的肥胖状况会怎么发展呢？

sentences.en: Some of the mountains in America have not yet been mapped out.
sentences.cn: 美洲有些山脉还没有在地图上标出来。

sentences.en: South America is joined to North America by a canal.
sentences.cn: 南美洲和北美洲由一条运河连在一起.

sentences.en: the animals and birds of South America
sentences.cn: 南美的鸟兽

sentences.en: the quincentenary of Columbus's voyage to America
sentences.cn: 哥伦布航海到达美洲的500周年纪念日

sentences.en: the United States of America
sentences.cn: 美利坚合众国

sentences.en: They came to America in order to escape political tyranny.
sentences.cn: 他们为逃避暴政而来到美洲.

sentences.en: They fled to South America around the turn of the century.
sentences.cn: 他们在世纪之交逃到了南美洲。

sentences.en: This event long antedates the arrival of Columbus in America.
sentences.cn: 这件事的发生远在哥伦布到达美洲之前。

sentences.en: We dowse oil and ore in South America for big companies.
sentences.cn: 我们在南美洲为一些大公司探测石油和矿石。

sentences.en: What part of South America did she come from?
sentences.cn: 她出生在南美洲的哪个地方?

words.tran_cn: 美国精神；美国风格；美国腔
美国；美洲（包括北美和南美洲）

phrases.tran_cn: 英属北美；英国保险公会北美洲保险区域
中美洲（位于墨西哥与南美洲之间）；中美洲各国
早安美国（美国广播公司早间节目的名称）
中美洲（墨西哥及美洲中部）

trans.tran_cn: 美洲，美国，[电影]亚美利加
trans.tran_en: a name commonly used for the US
